content: Sets of reciprocating saw blades Premium reciprocating saw blade sets for many metal and wood cutting tasks ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Set of high-performance reciprocating saw blades to cover your everyday cutting and demolition tasks Sets include bimetal blades for increased cutting power and lifespan Applications Heavy and light demolition work Cutting metal-embedded wood Cutting metal Cutting wood ### TECHNICAL DATA: Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: useita Blade features: Long life, Heavy duty Technical Data | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | useita | Blade features | Long life, Heavy duty ### ITEMS- 3535013 - Recip Blade Trial Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 5x Recip. saw blade SP 9 14 (5) metal - 5x Recip. saw blade SP 6 18 (5) metal - 5x Recip. saw blade SP 6 1014 (5) univ - 5x Recip. saw blade SP 6 6 (5) w/m
